title: Sticky chilli ginger sponge
description: The combination of ground ginger, allspice, stem ginger and chilli makes an intensely flavoured sponge cake, irresistibly slathered in toffee sauce.
ingredients: 4 stem ginger balls in syrup (roughly 75g/2½oz), drained and coarsely grated
1½ long red chillies, seeds removed, finely chopped
3 stem ginger balls in syrup (roughly 55g/2oz), drained
well-chilled crème fraîche or vanilla ice cream
finely grated or pared lime zest
